value.title: Sort Legend in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Tips and Tricks Video. This is a short and sweet video demonstrating the functionality to apply Sort on Legend values in Power BI. We can now adjust the sort direction for items in our legends! This will also help to reorder some of the data in visuals like stacked column charts,

value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)
value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. Patrick shows you 3 ways that can help do this without using Incremental Refresh or needing Power BI Premium!  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead.
